item.description:
Route Summary:
This is a 50 miler which extends my last posted ride of 38.

Starting in Concord thru Maynard and Stow to Harvard MA and back through Littleton and Acton with some big hills near Harvard and back thru Great Brook State Park.

The route
http://tinyurl.com/bt64m7z

Riders should plan to meet at 8:00 am and be ready to ride around 8:15am

We should return to the parking area around 1:30 pm if we can keep the 12 plus pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point
8 Keyes Rd Parking Area
Concord MA

Stopping point

Harvard General Store
1 Still River Road
Harvard, MA 01451
(978) 430-0062
harvardgeneralstore.com

And Great Brook State Park

 

What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
minimum 2-3 full water bottles (cold!).
bring snacks


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

http://files.meetup.com/482869/ConcordToHarvardToGreatBrookLoop.txt
item.name: Concord To Harvard to Great Brook State Park Loop 50 miler
